editorialSummary.text: Laid-back hotel featuring an outdoor pool & a fitness centre, plus a bar/restaurant.

text.text: Nice place to stay and relax with family. the hotel staff are well behaved and polite. Room service good and the food are tasty.

originalText.text: Nice place to stay and relax with family. the hotel staff are well behaved and polite. Room service good and the food are tasty.

text.text: I had visited this property during my CG/MP vacations in July 2023 from Kolkata. I must say the hotel meets all necessary attributes be it room wise, service wise or from a culinary perspective. The huge parking area of this hotel is a big plus added with a very pleasant location situated in the ring road. The reception staff were polite and gentle and offered us attractive discounts which does call for a repeat visit. Highly recommended to people wanting an accomodation to visit mainpath.

originalText.text: I had visited this property during my CG/MP vacations in July 2023 from Kolkata. I must say the hotel meets all necessary attributes be it room wise, service wise or from a culinary perspective. The huge parking area of this hotel is a big plus added with a very pleasant location situated in the ring road. The reception staff were polite and gentle and offered us attractive discounts which does call for a repeat visit. Highly recommended to people wanting an accomodation to visit mainpath.

text.text:
Don't waste your money on food in this restaurant. Priced are exorbitant but the quality is not good and they don't serve hot food even the tawa roti is also hard and cool . If you ask they will make it hot and get back you. I ordered chicken spring roll but there's no chicken in it only vegetables u need to search for chicken. The street food vendor makes better roll than this restaurant.
The ambience is good that's it.

text.text: No doubt it's a very good hotel to stay. I have enjoyed my stay there. Rooms are clean and beautiful. Stuffs are well behaived. Services are also very good.

All in all a pleasant experience.

text.text:
Since this is a new hotel feels good to visit as this was my first time.
Food is good. Wait time is a bit longer.
Main course daal was initially warm(looked not freshly prepared), upon request they immediately made a hot daal!
Pricing is on a higher side as compared to other hotels in city.
Staff is quite decent and polite.
Resturant's washroom could have been more clean and hygienic!

editorialSummary.text: Informal hotel featuring an international restaurant & breakfast, as well as an outdoor pool.

text.text: Nice Resort for many purposes like marriage, birthday party, and many other functions. Have big lawn for functions and well managed space for car parking which is very necessary in big functions. Nice ambiance and like the way it has so many amenities like swimming pool, nice decorated stage as per your choice great things to capture with your photos.

originalText.text: Nice Resort for many purposes like marriage, birthday party, and many other functions. text.text: Please improve the service staff of your restaurant. The cleaning staff and manager of the property have been co-operative! Also, please provide complete information regarding the prices and extra charges. If the swimming pool is chargeable then please let the guest know about it before they jump in the pool. A well informed guest is a happy guest. What we really loved about the property is the interiors and exteriors.

A well informed guest is a happy guest. What we really loved about the property is the interiors and exteriors.

text.text: I'm so happy I found this hotel. It is out of town and so quiet away from the horns etc. The room was great and after a few days in hotels that apparently had hot water (not) it was so nice to have a hot shower. The bed was very comfy, the best sleep so far in India. The staff are fantastic. I highly recommend this hotel.

text.text:
Service is very poor. Property is very good. Ambience is nice. But after all the food matters which was not upto the mark. Overall a bit pricy menu. And definitely they need some good menu design. Photocopy menu just gives a bad impression. Hope it improves in near future.

Update: after 8 months hotel food quality and service has not improved. Please change your chef.

text.text:
In the outskirts of Ambikapur, there lies this restaurant which all in all was average when we talk about food. One thing I liked was services provided by the restaurant staff. It was calm and very positive. Food was not too shabby but it could have been better. Portions of food for the prices were commendable.
If you are looking for quite place where you can feel like you have been treated well this is the 0lqce to go. But the food I mean I can be better, hope they do it. Or maybe it was one time thing that happened with me.

text.text:
The first impression was excellent, very well maintained property.
But the staff did a lot of delay in our order even though there wasn't any kind of big crowd.
After confirming the order we waited for more than 30 minutes for the food but  apart from the delay, the taste was amazing.
I recommend Veg Sizzler to everyone.

text.text:
So, visited this place in the evening with my friends.
The place has some good vibes. As, we sat in the tent, which is well decorated & are good.

The staffs are good & also the service is well.

(⭐out of 5)
Taste- ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
Presentation- ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
Ambience-⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
Recommended-⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

The taste of all the food items were well & good.
I tried -
1. Singapori Noodles
2. Paneer Chilly
3.  Baby Corn Chilly
4. Cold Coffee with ice cream

The taste of all the food items were good & tasty.

Also, the place is photogenic, where you can get some good clicks.

You can visit this place with your friends or family & spend some quality time here.

text.text:
Hotel is good & little long distance of main city......But hotel receptionist was Cheaters ..
If you book rooms online with some app you will see breakfast , wi fi , water bottle, laundry all things are free....But when you going to checkout receptionist forces you to pay for all your free things (water bottle, breakfast)..... Please don't visit & stay  any people without confirming in this hotel of cheaters..
